titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Women's Coordinating Council Meeting Minutes
Yale Women's Coordinating Council Meeting Minutes
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:43

did.unittitle: Yale Women's Coordinating Council meeting minutes

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The materials consist of meeting minutes documenting the activities of the Yale Women's Coordinating Council.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 40 (YRG 40), Records of Yale clubs, societies, and organizations.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The materials were transferred from the Yale University Women's Organization, 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Women's Coordinating Council Meeting Minutes (RU 1066). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Women's Coordinating Council (WCC) was an administrative assemly of members of Yale organizations that coordinated programs, interest groups, communications, and served as a sounding board for all women at Yale. It formed in 1969 when members of the Yale Student Wives joined the Council of University Organizations (1965), which previously included members of the Yale University Women's Organization (1965), Yale Dames (1918), and Yale Newcomers (1924). The WCC later included members of the Faculty Club, Divinity Wives, Law Wives, Forestry Wives, Around the World Wives, and Medical Wives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of meeting minutes documenting the activities of the Yale Women's Coordinating Council.
